meanings.definition: To depict or describe in painting or words.
meanings.sent1: She will limn a beautiful landscape with her paintbrush.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to limn the scene in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: He tried to limn his cat, but it ended up looking like a potato with whiskers.
meanings.sent4: Her words limned a vivid picture of the bustling city streets.
meanings.sent5: The author's ability to limn emotions made the story come alive.

meanings.definition: To outline or define with clearness.
meanings.sent1: The teacher will limn the steps to solve the math problem on the board.
meanings.sent2: He limned the boundaries of the property with a sturdy fence.
meanings.sent3: The recipe clearly limns the ingredients needed to bake a cake.
meanings.sent4: His speech limned the importance of honesty in relationships.
meanings.sent5: The map limned the route through the dense forest with precision.
